snippet: The campaign against legal activists is part of a pattern that’s dismally familiar in the annals of authoritarian governments....
abstract: Editorial points to sentencing of Chinese lawyer Zhou Shifeng to seven years in prison for spreading subversive thoughts as latest result in series of show trials in city of Tianjin, all of which stem from 2015 crackdown under Pres Xi Jinping; notes prosecutions are part of Xi's increasingly aggressive efforts to punish any criticism of Communist Party rule.
lead_paragraph: The campaign against legal activists is part of a pattern that’s dismally familiar in the annals of authoritarian governments.
